scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter backend start:dev" "pnpm --filter frontend dev" "pnpm --filter contracts node"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter contracts build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter contracts test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter contracts lint
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend build --clean && pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter contracts clean
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm --filter backend db:setup && pnpm --filter contracts build
scripts.setup:fresh: pnpm clean && pnpm install && pnpm --filter backend db:reset && pnpm build
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm deploy:contracts && pnpm deploy:backend && pnpm deploy:frontend
scripts.validate: pnpm lint && pnpm test && pnpm build
